translations.diagrams.description: Generate comprehensive UML diagrams that visualize your system architecture, user interactions, and business processes with professional precision using our AI-powered open source platform.
translations.diagrams.alt.diagramExample: example of diagram generated by IDEM
translations.diagrams.types.useCase.title: Use Case Diagrams
translations.diagrams.types.useCase.description: Visual representation of system functionality and user interactions
translations.diagrams.types.class.title: Class Diagrams
translations.diagrams.types.class.description: Object-oriented system structure with classes, attributes, and relationships
translations.diagrams.types.sequence.title: Sequence Diagrams
translations.diagrams.types.sequence.description: Time-ordered interaction between system components and actors
translations.diagrams.types.activity.title: Activity Diagrams
translations.diagrams.types.activity.description: Workflow and business process modeling with decision points
translations.diagrams.types.component.title: Component Diagrams
translations.diagrams.types.component.description: System architecture showing components and their dependencies
translations.diagrams.types.deployment.title: Deployment Diagrams
translations.diagrams.examples.ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform Use Cases
translations.diagrams.examples.ecommerce.description: User journey from registration to checkout
translations.diagrams.examples.ecommerce.preview: User → Browse Products → Add to Cart → Checkout → Payment → Order Confirmation
translations.diagrams.examples.saas.title: SaaS Application Classes
translations.diagrams.examples.saas.preview: User ← extends → Admin | Product → contains → Features | Subscription → manages → Billing
translations.diagrams.examples.api.title: API Authentication Sequence
translations.diagrams.examples.api.preview: Client → Auth Server → Database → Token Generation → Response
translations.diagrams.examples.healthcare.title: Healthcare Workflow Activity
translations.diagrams.examples.healthcare.preview: Patient Registration → Triage → Doctor Assignment → Treatment → Billing → Discharge
translations.diagrams.seo.name: AI UML Diagram Generation
translations.diagrams.seo.description: Automated generation of UML diagrams including use case, class, sequence, activity, component, and deployment diagrams
